verses.verse: And after these things, I heard the loud sound of a big crowd in the heaven saying, "Hallelujah (Hebrew for "praise Yahweh")! The rescue, the magnificence, the value, and the ability belong to the Master, our God,

because true and right are His judgments because He judged the prostitute, the huge one, someone who was worsening the earth in her sexual sin, and He retaliated for the blood of His slaves from her hand."
And a second time they have stated, "Hallelujah!" And her smoke tumbles up for the spans of time of the spans of time.
And the older men (the twenty-four) and the four living beings got down, bowed to God (the One sitting on the throne) saying, "Amen! Hallelujah!" (Hebrew for "praise Yahweh").
And a voice came out of the throne saying, "Praise our God, all His slaves, the ones fearing Him, the little, and the great."

And I heard as if it were the sound of a big crowd, as the sound of many waters, and as the sound of strong thunders, saying, "Hallelujah (Hebrew for "praise Yahweh"), because He was king, the Master, God, the All-Powerful One.
We may be happy and excited. And we will give the magnificence to Him because the wedding of the Lamb came and His wife got herself ready.
And it was given to her that she might put a clean and dazzling elegant linen robe around herself." You see, the elegant linen is the right paths of the sacred people.
And he says to me, "Write, 'The people are blessed who have been invited to the dinner of the wedding of the Lamb.'" And he says to me, "These messages of God are true."

And I got down in front of his feet to bow to him, and he says to me, "Look! No! I am a fellow slave of you and of your brothers, the ones who have what Jesus witnessed. Bow to God. You see, what Jesus witnessed is the spirit of the preaching."
And I saw the sky that had been opened and, look, a white horse and the One sitting on it who is called "Trustable and True." And in the right way He judges and wages war.
His eyes are as a blaze of fire and on His head many crowns, who has a name that has been written that no one knows except He Himself,
and around whom a robe has been put that has been dipped in blood. And His name is called the Message of God.
And the armed forces, the ones in the heaven, were following Him on white horses having put on an elegant linen robe, white and clean.

And out of His mouth travels a sharp sword so that with it He might slash the nations, He Himself will shepherd them with an iron staff, and He Himself traipses the grape smashing pit of the wine of the anger and the punishment of God, the All-Powerful One.
And He has on His robe and on His thigh a name that has been written, "King of kings and Master of masters."

And I saw one angel that had stood in the sun, and he yelled with a loud voice, saying to all the birds, the ones flying in the middle of the sky, "Come on, and be gathered together for the dinner of the great God,

so that you might eat physical bodies of kings, physical bodies of commanding officers, physical bodies of strong people, physical bodies of horses and of the people sitting on them, and physical bodies of all kinds of people, both free and slave, both little and great."
And I saw the wild animal, the kings of the earth, and their armed forces that had been gathered together to make war with the One sitting on the horse and with His armed unit.

And the wild animal was captured and with this, the fraudulent preacher, the one who did the indicators in his sight with which he misled the people who received the mark of the wild animal and the people bowing down to his image. Still living, the two were thrown into the lake of the fire, the one burning with the sulfur.
And the rest were killed with the sword of the One sitting on the horse, the sword traveling out of His mouth. And all the birds were full from their physical bodies.
